Title: Relates to requiring contractors and subcontractors to disclose the existence of property and casualty insurance
Summary: Requires contractors and subcontractors to disclose the existence of property and casualty insurance before they begin work on a home.
LawCode: Amd ยง771, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring contractors and subcontractors to disclose the existence of property and casualty insurance
